title: CNBC Daily Open: Markets see Warsh as a safe pick for Fed chair â€” causing gold and silver to plunge
summary_full: The U.S. dollar strengthened, signaling the market's approval of Warsh's credibility and perceived autonomy, but safe-haven assets gold and silver plummeted.
